name: 2048 (itch) (trinh.nguyen)
description:
Another clone of the 2048 game for MS-DOS. Use W,D,S,A to move the board, R to reset the game and ESC to quit.

  • Platform: MS-DOS
  • Genre: Puzzle
  • Number of players : 1

Full source code (Borland/TMT/Free Pascal compatible): https://github.com/dzutrinh/2048
